channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping on green outside playground, 8th December
item.description:
Someone has left a canvas cupboard on the grass outside the children's playground/

item.title: Glass/mirror table left next to St Johns School, 8th December
item.description:
Someone has left a side table made of glass/mirror against the St Johns School wall opposite 61a Amott Road. If this falls over it will smash and is really dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Amott Road, Greater London

item.title: Overgrown hedge blocking pavement, 8th December
item.description:
Overgrown hedge is preventing people using the pavement safely. It has been awful for ages but is now exacerbated by the new traffic sign for the school street which is in the middle of the pavement. The hedge needs trimming urgently and I’m assuming whoever owns the property it belongs to, has that responsibility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. John's Vale, Deptford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter all over the street, 8th December
item.description:
Gunton Road is a mess at the moment. We have issues with multiple occupancy buildings not having enough bin space and therefore rubbish spilling into the street. We also just have general issues of littering- I don’t think we have a street cleaner anymore

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gunton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo and litter everywhere, 8th December
item.description:
The pathway running alongside the cemetery up towards Hurst road is covered in dog poo , smashed alcohol bottles , empty beer cans, cigarette boxes and other litter. It is a key route families take to drop children at school and is very unpleasant and needs a clean up. Also could more security lighting and bins be added?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Longmead Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas canisters, 8th December
item.description:
Rubbish left after seeing a car full of people doing balloons in the car. Lv24 wzy vw polo Or golf Sunday 7th Dec 3pm Didn’t witness them throwing it outside but there was only 1 canister outside when we say them and when they left there were multiple
